name: EIP-6963 - Multi Injected Provider Discovery
description: Ethereum wallet providers are notorious for not playing nicely with each other due to legacy window.ethereum approach and the pitfalls that come along with it. Boidu will give an overview of the EIP-6963 upgrade path and showcase his testing dapp for helping wallets take it before breakout into an open workshop format.

speakers.name: Boidushya
speakers.bio: Boidu is a Developer Relations Engineer @ WalletConnect, and passionate about coordination. He is the creator and maintainer of eip6963.org, a test-dapp for helping browser-extension wallets take advantage of EIP-6963 connections.
